name: racialize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to cause or believe race to be an important feature of a group of people, of society, or of a problem: Immigrants and their children are put into a racialized category. He warned against racializing the housing issue.
More examplesFewer examplesA racialized group may gradually come to embrace the identity they have been ascribed.In a racialized society, perceived race profoundly affects life experiences and opportunities.
